# CAM::GET_GAMEPLAY_CAM_ROT

## Summary
Gets the game play cams rotation

## Parameters
* **EULER_ROT_ORDER** rotOrder = 2

## Returns
* **VECTOR**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p0 dosen't seem to change much, I tried it with 0, 1, 2:
0-Pitch(X): -70.000092
0-Roll(Y): -0.000001
0-Yaw(Z): -43.886459
1-Pitch(X): -70.000092
1-Roll(Y): -0.000001
1-Yaw(Z): -43.886463
2-Pitch(X): -70.000092
2-Roll(Y): -0.000002
2-Yaw(Z): -43.886467
